text.name: Dimension Shredder
text.desc:
Targets the rearmost unit (In regular encounters)

[BeforeAttack] Spend Charge Count to deal more damage (Max 50%)
coinDescs: [OnSucceedAttack] Deal bonus Pride damage by (Target’s Rupture x 7.5)% of the damage dealt, and reduce Rupture Count by 5 (Max 75%)

text.name: Dimension Shredder

[BeforeAttack] Spend Charge Count to deal more damage (Max <style="highlight">75%)
coinDescs: [OnSucceedAttack] Deal bonus Pride damage by (Target’s Rupture x <style="highlight">10)% of the damage dealt, and reduce Rupture Count by 5 (Max <style="highlight">100%)

text.name: Dimension Shredder
text.desc:
Targets the rearmost unit (In regular encounters)

[BeforeAttack] Spend Charge Count to deal more damage (Max 75%)<style="highlight">
coinDescs: [OnSucceedAttack] If Charge Count was spent, inflict <style="highlight">5 [DimensionRift]
[OnSucceedAttack] Deal bonus Pride damage by (Target’s Rupture x 10)% of the damage dealt, and reduce Rupture Count by 5 (Max 100)<style="highlight">

passiveList.name: Rambling Man
passiveList.desc:
At the start of the turn, if this unit took no damage last turn, gain +4 Charge Count.
After successfully hitting an enemy with lower Speed, inflict +1 Rupture Count. (3 times per turn)

text.name: Dimension Shredder
text.desc:
[CantIdentify]
Targets a random unit

[BeforeAttack] Spend Charge Count to deal more damage (Max 50%)
coinDescs: [OnSucceedAttack] Deal bonus Pride damage by (Target’s [Burst] x 7.5)% of the damage dealt, and reduce [Burst] Count by 5 (Max 75%)
